code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css";import{Outlet}from"react-router-dom";import Navbar from"../components/admin/Navbar";import AppSidebar from"../components/admin/AppSidebar";import{mockAdmin}from"../data/Mockdata";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminDashboard=()=>{const[sidebarOpen,setSidebarOpen]=useState(true);const toggleSidebar=()=>setSidebarOpen(!sidebarOpen);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex bg-light",style:{minHeight:"100vh",overflow:"hidden"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppSidebar,{isOpen:sidebarOpen,onClose:toggleSidebar}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex flex-column flex-grow-1",style:{marginLeft:sidebarOpen?"240px":"70px",transition:"margin-left 0.3s ease",minWidth:0},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{admin:mockAdmin,onMenuClick:toggleSidebar,sidebarOpen:sidebarOpen}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"flex-grow-1 p-4",style:{overflowY:"auto",backgroundColor:"#f8f9fa"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Outlet,{})})]})]});};export default AdminDashboard;
